meanings.definition: A person who is absent or not present.
meanings.sent1: The teacher marked the absenters on the attendance sheet.
meanings.sent2: The absenters missed an important meeting yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The absenters must have overslept this morning!
meanings.sent4: The empty chairs in the classroom made it clear who the absenters were.
meanings.sent5: The search party found the absenters wandering in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The absenters gathered outside the school gates.
meanings.sent2: The teacher called out the names of the absenters.
meanings.sent3: The absenters formed a club for students who often miss class.
meanings.sent4: The group of absenters stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The absenters left their books behind in the rush to leave.
